summary: Comprehensive testing of HR Platform Offboarding Module completed. Backend APIs achieved 100% success rate (26/26 tests passed). Frontend testing confirmed all offboarding features including template CRUD, offboarding assignment, task completion, clearance updates, exit interviews, employee view, and responsive design. Fixed 1 bug during testing: SelectItem empty value error in Start Offboarding dialog. Added 'My Offboarding' navigation link for employees.

issues: Console warning: Missing `Description` or `aria-describedby={undefined}` for {DialogContent} - minor accessibility issue

passed_tests: Backend: Create template with tasks (5 tasks, multiple categories: asset_return, access_revocation, knowledge_transfer, exit_interview, documentation)
Backend: Get offboarding stats (total, in_progress, completed, on_hold, not_started, overdue_tasks, avg_completion_rate)
Backend: Create offboarding from template - tasks copied correctly with completion tracking fields
Backend: Auto-complete offboarding when all tasks done
Backend: Update clearance (HR, IT, Finance, Manager, Admin)
Backend: Update all clearances to true
Backend: Update exit interview (conducted, date, notes)
Frontend: Admin - Offboarding page loads with stats cards (In Progress, Completed, Overdue Tasks, Avg Completion)
Frontend: Admin - Active/Completed/Templates tabs visible and functional
Frontend: Admin - Create Template dialog with task builder
Frontend: Admin - Add tasks with categories, due days, required flag, assigned_to_type
Frontend: Admin - Start Offboarding dialog with employee/template/reason selection
Frontend: Admin - View offboarding details with progress and clearance status
Frontend: Admin - Clearance dialog with all 5 department checkboxes
Frontend: Admin - Exit Interview dialog with date and notes

Frontend: Employee - My Offboarding navigation link visible in sidebar

critical_code_review_comments: OffboardingTemplate model correctly stores tasks array with all required fields (title, description, category, due_day, is_required, assigned_to_type, order)
Offboarding model properly copies tasks from template and adds completion tracking fields (completed, completed_at, completed_by, completion_notes)
Auto-complete logic correctly marks offboarding as completed when all tasks are done
Stats endpoint provides comprehensive metrics including overdue task count and average completion rate
Clearance fields (clearance_hr, clearance_it, clearance_finance, clearance_manager, clearance_admin) properly tracked
Exit interview fields (exit_interview_conducted, exit_interview_date, exit_interview_notes) properly stored
Employee view correctly shows task categories, clearance status, and progress tracking
seed_data_creation: Test templates and offboardings created during testing were cleaned up after tests completed.

bugs_fixed_during_testing.fix: Changed template_id select to use 'none' as value instead of empty string, with conversion logic in onValueChange

bugs_fixed_during_testing.issue: Employee 'My Offboarding' navigation link missing from sidebar
bugs_fixed_during_testing.fix: Added NavLink for '/offboarding' with label 'My Offboarding' for non-admin users

context_for_next_testing_agent: Offboarding module is fully functional. Backend APIs all working with 100% test coverage. Frontend has admin view with template management, offboarding assignment, clearance updates, exit interviews, and progress tracking. Employee view shows 'My Offboarding' with progress bar, clearance status, and task list. Two bugs were fixed during testing: (1) SelectItem empty value error fixed by using 'none' instead of empty string, (2) Added 'My Offboarding' link for employees in sidebar. Task categories supported: asset_return, access_revocation, knowledge_transfer, documentation, exit_interview, clearance, administrative, other. Separation reasons: resignation, termination, retirement, contract_end, layoff. Offboarding statuses: not_started, in_progress, completed, on_hold. Clearance fields: clearance_hr, clearance_it, clearance_finance, clearance_manager, clearance_admin. Auto-complete triggers when all tasks are marked complete.
